Package com.unitedcaterers.server

Class Summary
Request This class wraps the action (method name) and the parameters into an object which is serialized and sent to the server.
Response There server calls the appropriate method depending on the request and wraps the result or exceptions into an object of this class.
RMIServerMain This class provides the startup method for the RMI Server application.
RMIUCServerImpl Since we need to make this a RMI Remote object we have to extend it from UnicastRemoteObject and so we cannot extend it from UCServer.
ServerPropertiesDialog This class provides a simple GUI to capture parameters required to run RMI based server.
SocketServerMain This class provides the startup method for the Socket Server application.
SocketUCServerImpl The purpose of this class is to accept client connections and broker the requests and responses.
UCServerImpl This abstract class captures all the business methods required by the client.
